items.title: 3 Dividend-Paying Artificial Intelligence Stocks to Buy in 2025
items.description: Artificial intelligence has been a hot market throughout 2024.  AI fueled the surge in share price for companies such as Nvidia, which saw its stock rise nearly 180% over the past year through Dec. 31.  A great way to capitalize on the AI boom is to invest in companies that are not only involved in artificial intelligence, but also pay a robust, dependable dividend.

items.title: Why Quantum Computing Stocks Skyrocketed in December
items.description: Why did quantum computing stocks continue to surge in December 2024? Here's what you need to know about the quantum computing industry's progress and challenges.

items.title: Prediction: Quantum Computing Will Be the Biggest Theme in Artificial Intelligence (AI) in 2025. But Does That Mean You Should Invest in It?
items.author: The Motley Fool
items.description: The article discusses the recent surge in quantum computing stocks like IonQ, Rigetti Computing, and Quantum Computing, and whether investors should consider investing in this emerging technology.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article suggests that the recent surge in IonQ's stock price is more speculative in nature, driven by online discussions, rather than being based on the company's actual progress and scalability in quantum computing.
